item.title: The Truth Of 9/11.... very Creepy video!
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

daycrawler:

Yours are based off of what then? That you saw a plane hit the buildings?

Your argument is so fallacious I don’t even know where to start. Watching the buildings get hit by the planes proves nothing either way, rendering your overtly exaggerated suggestion irrelevant. And my mother was right under one of the WTC buildings right after the first plane hit. I think that’s close enough to watching a plane hit the WTC. Maddox makes some very good points in his blog, if you ever take the time to read it, I’m sure you will agree. The very fact that the government did not do anything about these conspiracy videos when they do stuff like this, is enough to show that there is no conspiracy. And how nothing from any of the numerous government officials leaked, while some random person pulled a series of events together to point the finger at the government.

In my post, my point was that PaulT’s references to various events that indicate the government’s involvement are unfounded as he posted them. Those facts alone are not enough to prove anything. Not to say they are wrong; far from it. It’s just that without proper backing, they have no value. As of now, there is no substantial evidence one way or the other. All we have are motives and various events that happened that seem to be related.

Read full topic
item.source: The Truth Of 9/11.... very Creepy video!

item.title: The Truth Of 9/11.... very Creepy video!
item.dc:creator: @daycrawler daycrawler
item.description:
@daycrawler wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:16, topic:130962”][quote author=PaulT link=topic=181663.msg1658787#msg1658787 date=1186524871]
Obviously the plane was not replaced by a missile (in any of the flights) yet to those who doubt the government was at least complacent I ask how a civilian aircraft could have bypassed the defense systems of the headquarters of the most advanced military in the world (the Pentagon) if there were not stand down orders, why the government shot down the plane over Pennsylvania and lied about it, and why the massive insider trading in the days before 9/11 was not investigated by the government. Also the assasination of Ahmad Shah Massoud two days before 9/11 and the Project For a New American Century documents calling for a “New Pearl Harbour” are good indications of guilt.
[/quote]

I think many of these are subjective questions based on insubstantial data, though you could prove me wrong by specifically citing neutral sources.[/quote]
Yours are based off of what then? That you saw a plane hit the buildings?

Read full topic

item.title: The Truth Of 9/11.... very Creepy video!
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

PaulT:

Obviously the plane was not replaced by a missile (in any of the flights) yet to those who doubt the government was at least complacent I ask how a civilian aircraft could have bypassed the defense systems of the headquarters of the most advanced military in the world (the Pentagon) if there were not stand down orders, why the government shot down the plane over Pennsylvania and lied about it, and why the massive insider trading in the days before 9/11 was not investigated by the government. Also the assasination of Ahmad Shah Massoud two days before 9/11 and the Project For a New American Century documents calling for a “New Pearl Harbour” are good indications of guilt.

I think many of these are subjective questions based on insubstantial data, though you could prove me wrong by specifically citing neutral sources.

Read full topic

item.title: The Truth Of 9/11.... very Creepy video!
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Cunit:

then why was it a white plane…? AA (american airlines) is NOT a white aircraft. It was much bigger than what AA flys. can’t but i mean box cutters??? ide start lafing in there face if some1 tryed to hyjack an airplane with boxcutters… with 40+ people on board… COME ON!

Who said it was a white plane?

And would you be the first to face multiple terrorist(s) if they had box cutters? They can be wielded and used just like daggers, if you can’t fathom the amount of pain box cutters can do. Especially if you didn’t know they would fly it into the WTC. You would expect them to land it somewhere and demand some ransom. Therefore, no lives need to be given up to defend the plane, therefore the people would not bother stopping them. Don’t speculate with some dumb shit like that.

And finally, whatever Maddox said about Loose Change applies to this conspiracy video, which I won’t even waste my brain cells watching.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Dgc2002 Dgc2002
item.description:
@Dgc2002 wrote:

If you take the 911 commission report word for word you are an idiot. I’m not saying there is some big conspiracy, but the report is off on alot of even basic physics. There are a shit load(88 roughly) of security tapes that would prove the 911 commission report if they were released, but they have been seized by the fbi and haven’t been released.

I’m just curious, how deep did the goverment have their hands on this attack? They knew about these attacks, bush hardly reacted when he heard the use, this attack was incredibly convenient for the presidential administration’s agenda seeing as they wanted to attack iraq from the beginning and obviously want the oil there.
